summary: A passion for technology kicked off my career as a software developer and later led me into Agile and Product development. With over 10 years of international experience within Agile leadership roles, I bring in expertise from a variety of companies, from unicorn startups to Fortune 500 companies across Latin America and Europe. Most recently, I'm acting as an Agile Coach at Booking.com, and have relocated to a new country for the third time in my life now residing in the Netherlands.
